strings: But <DEF_ART_ACTOR> doesn't notice the party's presence!

Red successfully half-inched <val_0> gold coins as well!
The double bubble can <IF_SING val_0>only be used once more!<ELSE_NOT_SING>be used another <val_0> times.<ENDIF_SING>

<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> looks at the party with respect.<page>Send <DEF_ART_ACTOR> to Morrie's place?
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> looks at the party with respect. Do you wish to add them to your monster team members?
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> slinks off without saying a word.
You already have the maximum number of team members allowed. Please select a monster to release back into the wild.

<se_def>*: The contest has been decided!
The winner of this battle is...
<se_def>*: We have a winner!<IF_TEAM_TITLE_EXIST> They're ‘<TEAM_TITLE>’!<ELSE_NOT_TEAM_TITLE_EXIST><ENDIF_TEAM_TITLE_EXIST> It's <TEAM_NAME>!

<se_def>*: The battle has been decided! Put your hands together for the winning team! <Cap><string_1>!

<se_def>*: We have a winner!
The winner of the Monster Arena <Cap><string_2> battle is...
<se_def>*: Ladies and gentlemen, we have an announcement to make.
<se_def>*: The current Monster Arena battle has exceeded the time limit and ended in a draw.
<se_def>*: As such, the current match is being called! There is no winner!
Each living party member receives <val_0> experience points!

<Cap><character_0> hasn't learnt any abilities for battle!
<Cap><string_0> can't be used because a weapon is equipped!

<Cap><DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0> is cursed and cannot be removed!
<Cap><character_0> must be level <val_0> or higher to equip <INDEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_1>.
<Cap><hero> cannot be removed from the battle party.
There are no other living members of the party with whom to switch!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> peers deep into <DEF_ART_TARGET>'s eyes as he carries out his <ACTION_0>!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> cackles insanely and launches an attack!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> draws its bow and lets an arrow fly!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> and friend join forces and attack <DEF_ART_TARGET> together!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> leaps into the air and attacks!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> falls into an even deeper sleep!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> is put into an even deeper sleep!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> is further prevented from casting spells!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> is further unable to cast spells!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> is enveloped in even more illusions!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> tries to use <INDEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0> as a tool...
But it doesn't seem necessary for <DEF_ART_TARGET> at the moment.
But it doesn't seem necessary for <DEF_ART_TARGET> at the moment.
The bag is tied tightly shut.
The metal's brilliance is dazzling and its weight strangely reassuring.
Munchie's tiny body shakes as he spews a f-f-frightfully c-c-cold breath!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> says a prayer to the Godbird Sceptre.
But nothing appears in the crystal ball.
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> takes a critical hit and dies instantly!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> swings the axe with all their might!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR>'s carefully aimed thrust booms like thunder!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR>'s carefully aimed thrust flashes like lightning!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> takes a critical hit from the <cause_item>!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> crouches and thrusts at the enemy!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> jumps, spins and slams their body into <DEF_ART_TARGET>!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> has a huge grin on their face!
But <DEF_ART_TARGET> laughs triumphantly having won the battle of the bulges.
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> has no idea what to do!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> is having an argument with itself!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> is intoxicated by the sound of its own voice!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> is too busy doodling to attack!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> assesses the situation with a big grin.
<Cap><INDEF_ART_TARGET_2> and <INDEF_ART_TARGET_3> suddenly tunnel up from underground!
Dhoulmagus laughs confidently and opens both hands!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> rips open the fabric of space with the sceptre!
*: I'm Mum! I'll form the head!
*: I'm Boh! I'll form the legs!
*: I'm Jum! I'll form the arm!
*: I'm Boe! I'll form the other arm!
The power of four becomes one!
Mum, Boh, Jum and Boe join forces to become the massive mumboh-jumboe!
Jab, the greatest warrior in history!
Ber, the greatest warrior in the world!
Woc, the greatest warrior on the planet!
Jab, Ber, Woc and Kee join forces to become the massive jabberwockee!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> and its band increase in level!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> raises its tension higher and higher.
<Cap><TEAM_NAME> is blown away! <Cap><alive_players> returns to the battle!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> thrusts with the force of a hurricane!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> closes their eyes and avoids the attack.
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> flings the ball from the top of his staff!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> swings his sword in a huge arc!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> launches an ultra high-speed combo attack!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> draws a crest in the air!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> transforms into a blade and attacks!
Sharp feathers fly like arrows from <DEF_ART_ACTOR>'s wings!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> suddenly drops down on <DEF_ART_TARGET> from above!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> raises their weapon and calls forth the anger of the gods!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> fires a flurry of poison needles!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> flexes his muscles like a macho man!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> is knocked off their feet in surprise!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> conjures the Dragovian Seal! It envelops the party!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> is enveloped by the Dragovian Seal!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> is enveloped by the Dragovian Seal and cannot move!
But the curse evaporates before hitting <DEF_ART_TARGET>!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> throws cursed orbs of pure hatred!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> lowers its horned head and charges!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> remains ensnared by a collar and cannot move!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> remains entwined by thorny vines and cannot move!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> chants ominously and meteors shower from the sky!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> and its band play a melody of death!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> empties its jar all in one gulp!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> grabs <DEF_ART_TARGET> and slams them to the ground!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> closes their eyes and begins saying a prayer! A malevolent energy fills in the air!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> stirs up a cloud of sand!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET>'s eyes are blinded by the sand!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET>'s eyes are totally blinded by sand!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> releases all their magic power at once!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> release all their magic power at once!
A gang of old geezers gathers at King Trode's command!
The party is enveloped in a comforting robe of flame!
The party is enveloped in a comforting robe of ice!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR>'s whole body shakes as it spews f-f-frightfully c-c-cold breath!
<IF_TARGETTOP_SIDE_P>The party is<ELSE_NOT_TARGETTOP_SIDE_P>The enemies are<ENDIF_TARGETTOP_SIDE_P> enveloped in a soft light!
A shining wall of light appears before <DEF_ART_TARGET>!
Another shining wall of light appears before <DEF_ART_TARGET>!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> is absolutely enthralled by <DEF_ART_TARGET>'s fine form!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> uses the lizard humour to cover the party's scent.
The scent of lizard fills the air!
The slimes appear to be fusing together!?!
The slimes merge into an enormous king slime!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> strikes with a Lv. 1 wind sickle attack!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> strikes with a Lv. 6 wind sickle attack!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> launches a Lv. 1 thin air attack!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> launches a Lv. 6 thin air attack!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> thrusts their sword into the ground!

Lightning bolts arc through the earth to strike <IF_TARGETTOP_SIDE_P>the party<ELSE_NOT_TARGETTOP_SIDE_P><IF_TARGET_SOLO>the enemy<ELSE_TARGET_NOT_SOLO>the enemies<ENDIF_TARGET_SOLO><ENDIF_TARGETTOP_SIDE_P>!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> grabs some snow and flings it into the air!
Blocks of ice rain down from the sky!
A mysterious barrier envelops <IF_TARGETTOP_SIDE_P>the party!<ELSE_NOT_TARGETTOP_SIDE_P>the enemies!<ENDIF_TARGETTOP_SIDE_P>
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR>: C'mon, let's do the hustle! ♪ One, two, three! ♫
They merge into Ultrus, the Ultra Slime!
They merge into the Gracky, the Great Dracky!
They merge into the monstrous Mazin!
They merge into the humongous Guaca Mole!
Thousands of whips extend from <DEF_ART_ACTOR>'s staff!
But the enemy has the party surrounded!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> has no idea what to do!
But the paralysis prevents any movement!
But <DEF_ART_TARGET>'s tension doesn't increase to the maximum!
But <DEF_ART_TARGET>'s tension doesn't increase to the maximum!

<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> generates a disruptive wave of energy!

<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> mows down everything in its path!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> calls forth bolts from the blue!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> opens his purple eyes wide and glares at <DEF_ART_TARGET>!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> attacks three times in rapid succession with the speed of a pouncing tiger!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> remains entwined by thorny vines and cannot move!

The effect of <DEF_ART_ACTOR>'s Insulatle wears off.
The effect of <DEF_ART_ACTOR>'s Bounce wears off.
The effect of <DEF_ART_ACTOR>'s Ban Dance wears off!
The strange glow around <DEF_ART_ACTOR> fades away!
The effect of <DEF_ART_ACTOR>'s Divine Intervention wears off!
The magic mirror absorbs the power of the Gigaflash and transforms into the sun mirror!
The Godbird Sceptre glows in response to the party's prayers!
The soul of a great sage emerges from the sceptre and fuses with an orb!

But the prayers are not strong enough!
The souls of the sages are not awakened!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> focuses all his energy in his fist and lets fly with a prize-winning punch!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> lures the party with a bewitching pose!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> focuses all his energy into his sword and delivers a critical hit!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> thrusts their sword hard into the ground!
A streak of great sabrecats appears, chasing after and pawing at a ball!
The monstrous Mazin descends from above to lend a helping hand!
Some slimes show up helpfully to heal the wounded!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> reaches a state of high tension!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> reaches a state of super high tension!!!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> looks on with a stony expression.
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> prays to open a portal to the heavens.
A voice from somewhere can be heard calling <DEF_ART_ACTOR>...
The wall of light deflects the spell!
The spell is deflected by the wall of light!
Red summons her mateys to the fight!
The steadfast seamen stop swabbing decks and bombard the battlefield!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> swings a punch with all their might!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> feels roused by Morrie's fighting spirit!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> is already under the influence of Oomph!
<IF_ACTOR_SOLO><Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> springs<ELSE_ACTOR_NOT_SOLO>The party's reserve members spring<ENDIF_ACTOR_SOLO> into action!

<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> drops a treasure chest!
<Cap><leader> opens it up!

It contains <INDEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_1>!

<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> feels as good as new again!
<Cap><DEF_ART_TARGET> suffers from the effects of poison!
<Cap><DEF_ART_ACTOR> makes a devastating punch with a hulking-great fist!
